import { useState, useContext } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { UserContext } from "../context/userContext"; export default function LoginPage() { const { login } = useContext(UserContext) const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const onHandleSubmit = async() => { await login(email, password) } return (
setEmail(event.target.value)} value={email} /> setPassword(event.target.value)} value={password} />
Don't have an account yet?{" "} Sign up here
); }
